content: Create a list of 3 humorous puns or one-liners that relate to the specific topic of pizza, including references to the ingredients, cooking methods, or cultural associations surrounding this popular Italian dish.

Sure, here are three humorous puns and one-liners related to pizza:

1. "Why did the pizza maker go broke? Because he just couldn’t make enough dough!"

2. "I told my friend I was making a pizza joke, but she said it was too cheesy. I told her to leave it to the ‘provolone’!"

3. "What did the pizza say to the topping? You’re the ‘slice’ of my life!"
